title: Help Neighbors Beat the Heat
content: As Portland experiences record breaking heat, those struggling with homelessness are facing the very real threat of heat exhaustion and heat stroke due to limited shelter options brought about by the COVID-19 pandemic. While the doors of Portland Rescue Mission are always open, 24 hours a day, we will be making water and other vital services available to anyone in need, any time they need it. The need-and the opportunity to serve our neighbors in need-has never been greater. Please give a generous gift today to meet this urgent need.
